name: Product & Category Management API
desc: Spring Boot REST API with JPA & Hibernate for products and categories, featuring CRUD, DTOs, and Swagger.

name: Banking Application
desc: A secure RESTful web application with account creation, deposits, withdrawals, and balance inquiry features using Java and Spring Boot.

name: E-Commerce Website
desc: A full-stack shopping site with user login, product listings, and cart functionality using Spring Boot, MySQL, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Hotel Reservation System
desc: A Java-JDBC based application to manage hotel bookings with CRUD operations connected to a MySQL database.

name: Portfolio Website
desc: A responsive personal portfolio website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to present my skills, highlight projects, and provide contact information in a clean and user-friendly design..
